channel.title: Erorr when i try to run any runserver.bat
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Any have some answers for this?

item.title: Erorr when i try to run any runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

It can’t find your server class, which could mean that you haven’t compiled yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Erorr when i try to run any runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

um kid… its not the age of the laptop that counts… its the FACT that its a laptop… laptops and desktop’s run diferently on some things for some reason… for example my aunt the newest desktop and laptop… but still cannot run all programs on both things… some just dont work on laptops… and 474+ servers are one of em

EDIT: if u really wanna count it up more play 317’s because MOST people have customs added… for example the gs’s and stuff…

Read full topic

Umm my computer is newer…it has 4.00GB RAM; and is extremely fast, and only reason i don’t want to start working on a 317 or 377 is because more players play the newest ones…and the gs and items are way better XD

yea ill jsut say thats a 508 deal with laptops… they never worked well… i recomment a 317 or 377 for a laptop fore laptops may also not carry as much RAM as desktops… myn can only carry 1gb of ram… literally… just 2 512mb sticks… so i gotta run a 317 with a special runner i wrote to allow 12 connections max lolz… and its filled constantly

item.title: Erorr when i try to run any runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“i hit u i, post:3, topic:279320”]@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause[/quote]
hmm… thats a 508 bat… i couldnt EVER get somethign to work for those… u running a laptop?

item.title: Erorr when i try to run any runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @i_hit_u_i i hit u i
item.description:
@i_hit_u_i wrote:

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

-I have tried like 4 different sources too; so i’m guessing alot of source’s compiler/runservers are not working

  • Btw my compiler does the same thing the code for that is

@echo off title Compiler cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java pause

The error for the compiler says:
The system cannont find the path specified.
Press any button to continue…
